intro: A geisha’s heart longs for freedom… will you be the one to set it free?
description:
In the floating world of beauty and illusion, love is the most dangerous secret of all.
You arrive as a stranger… but soon, one glance, one whispered word, changes everything.

Each geisha hides a story  of duty, desire, and dreams long buried beneath layers of silk and silence.
As you grow closer, your choices will shape a fragile bond that could either blossom into forbidden love… or fade like cherry petals in the wind.

Will you be the one to free her heart… or let her disappear into the shadows of tradition?

How far would you go for love that was never meant to be?


Game Features:

● Romance among the blossoms: Fall for captivating geishas, each with her own past, secrets, and emotions waiting to unfold.

● Your choices decide her fate: Comfort her, challenge her, or confess your feelings. Every decision changes your shared destiny.

● A poetic journey through the floating world: Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of beauty, melancholy, and passion.

● Multiple endings: Discover the bittersweet paths of love, freedom, and sacrifice.

● A visual novel of emotion and elegance: Where every word, glance, and gesture can change the course of a heart.


Will you risk everything to love a geisha who can never be yours?
